QuestData.Title: Gathering the Spark
QuestData.Description: We need to get our hands on arcane energy to complete our scroll. It needs that fiery kick.$B$BI have a device capable of capturing energy in the space below, so let's get moving. The infused creatures shouldn't be an issue for the two of us.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. This ought to be just what we need.
